Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class CommandHandlerImpl

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.CommandHandlerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommandHandler
class CommandHandlerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandHandler
CommandHandlerImpl is thought to handle all commands received by Server. Its methods are based on polymorphism: a general command arrives to Server, but the different ways to handle it depend on the dynamic type of the command itself. Then, a proper call to Controller is made, in order to interact directly with Model and modify it in the right way (if necessary). This follows Visitor Pattern guidelines.
See Also:
CommandHandler

  • Method Details

    • handle

      public void handle​(InitialInfoCommand command)
      This method handles an InitialInfoCommand. In particular, it sets the Player who gave the command to the command itself, then calls an appropriate Controller method for further things to do with it.
      Specified by:
      handle in interface CommandHandler
      Parameters:
      command - command containing player's nickname and colour
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - if current phase is not InitialInfo phase
      See Also:
      Controller.handleInitialInfoCommand(InitialInfoCommand)

    • handle

      public void handle​(PlayerCommand command)
      This method handles a PlayerCommand. In particular, it sets the Player who gave the command to the command itself, associates the coordinates to the "real" Cell (Model-side) and worker ID to the "real" Worker (Model-side); then, an appropriate Controller method is called for further things to do with the command.
      Specified by:
      handle in interface CommandHandler
      Parameters:
      command - command containing player's move, build, ... in RealGame phase (the proper match)
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - if current phase is not RealGame phase
      See Also:
      Controller.handlePlayerCommand(PlayerCommand)

    • handle

      public void handle​(GodChoiceCommand command)
      This method handles a GodChoiceCommand. In particular, it sets the Player who gave the command to the command itself, then calls an appropriate Controller method for further things to do with it.
      Specified by:
      handle in interface CommandHandler
      Parameters:
      command - command containing player's chosen god (or gods if god-chooser player)
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - if current phase is not ChooseGods phase
      See Also:
      Controller.handleGodChoiceCommand(GodChoiceCommand)

    • handle

      public void handle​(GamePreparationCommand command)
      This method handles a GamePreparationCommand. In particular, it sets the Player who gave the command to the command itself and associates the coordinates to the "real" Cell (Model-side); then, an appropriate Controller method is called for further things to do with the command.
      Specified by:
      handle in interface CommandHandler
      Parameters:
      command - command containing initial positions of workers on the board
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - if current phase is not GamePreparation phase
      See Also:
      Controller.handleGamePreparationCommand(GamePreparationCommand)

    • setCommandPlayerInstance

      private void setCommandPlayerInstance​(Command command)
      This private method associates a given Command to the Player who gave it.
      Parameters:
      command - general command coming from one of the players (Client) to Server
